extraction_info.text: Software Installation and Configuration Guide Document Management System v3.2 Table of Contents: 1. System Requirements 2. Installation Procedures 3. Initial Configuration 4. User Account Setup 5. Security Configuration 6. Troubleshooting 1. System Requirements Minimum Hardware Requirements: - CPU: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5 (2.5 GHz minimum) - RAM: 8 GB minimum, 16 GB recommended - Storage: 500 GB available disk space - Network: 1 Gbps Ethernet connection Software Requirements: - Operating System: Windows 10/11, macOS 10.15+, or Ubuntu 18.04+ - Database: PostgreSQL 12+ or MySQL 8.0+ - Web Server: Apache 2.4+ or Nginx 1.18+ - Runtime: Node.js 16+ and Python 3.8+ 2. Installation Procedures Step 1: Download the installation package from the official website Step 2: Verify the package integrity using the provided SHA-256 checksum Step 3: Extract the installation files to a temporary directory Step 4: Run the installation script with administrator privileges Command Line Installation: ```bash sudo ./install.sh --config=production --database=postgresql ``` 3. Initial Configuration After installation, configure the following settings: - Database connection parameters - SMTP server settings for email notifications - SSL certificate configuration - Backup and recovery settings Configuration File Location: /etc/docmanager/config.yml 4. User Account Setup Create administrative user account: Username: admin Password: [Generate secure password] Permissions: Full system access 5. Security Configuration Enable the following security features: - Multi-factor authentication (MFA) - Role-based access control (RBAC) - Audit logging - Data encryption at rest and in transit 6. Troubleshooting Common Issues: - Database connection failures: Check credentials and network connectivity - Performance issues: Monitor system resources and optimize database queries - Authentication problems: Verify LDAP/Active Directory configuration Support Contact: Technical Support: support@docmanager.com Phone: 1-800-DOC-HELP Documentation: https://docs.docmanager.com Version History: v3.2.0 - Added advanced search capabilities v3.1.5 - Bug fixes and security updates v3.1.0 - Initial release with workflow automation
